id.description: Male, 30, works for Nima at the Ijtihad library. Fighter (MMA). Fear, rage. "I call aqua bullshit", "Johnny Murderseed".

aspects.aspect: Don't want to cross the line
Better to be rid of them, than become one

phase.events: The world got worse with the rise of monsters. The fear and rancor caused become too much for me. Better to be rid of them, than become one. So I DID something about it.
Knows of D'jani from the library. Frequents antique book section for hours, and talks to himself. Cool with him and sense different emotions from him.
